summary: A failed actor switches identities with a stranger at a bath house thinking it is his way out of his life of misery but only to find himself filling the shoes of an elite assassin.
cast: Masato Sakai|Teruyuki Kagawa|Ryôko Hirosue|Yoshiyoshi Arakawa|Yuina Arakawa|Daisuke Hibi|Miwako Kakei|Yôko Moriguchi|Sayuri Oyamada
title: Kagi-dorobô no mesoddo
